text: Jürgen Kißner or Kissner (18 August 1942 – 18 May 2019) was a German cyclist. He competed for West Germany. He won the silver medal in the team pursuit at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Luckau, Brandenburg. Kissner died on 18 May 2019 in Cologne, at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jürgen Kissner at Sports-Reference.com Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German cyclists Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Brandenburg
title: Jürgen Kissner
